titles.title: Expressing profound sorrow for the death of the Honorable Bob Stump and gratitude to the Honorable Bob Stump for serving the United States and the State of Arizona with honor and distinction in his 26 years as a Member of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 6/24/2003--Introduced. Expresses the profound sorrow of Congress upon the death of the Honorable Bob Stump on June 20, 2003, and extends its condolences to his family. Expresses its gratitude to the Honorable Bob Stump for the services that he rendered to the Nation in the United States Navy, the Arizona State Legislature, and Congress.Recognizes with respect the Honorable Bob Stump's integrity, steadfastness, and loyalty to the United States.
